title: Episode #68: John Carlin on Cybersecurity
itunes:title: Episode #68: John Carlin on Cybersecurity
itunes:subtitle: John Carlin, the Acting Assistant Attorney General for National Security at the Department of Justice, gave a keynote address on cybersecurity at American University’s Washington College of Law.
description:
John Carlin, the Acting Assistant Attorney General for National Security at the Department of Justice, gave a keynote address on cybersecurity at American University’s Washington College of Law.

Support this show http://supporter.acast.com/lawfare.
